name: OpenAI Text Summarization
description: Example using OpenAI connector for AI-powered text summarization

parameters.systemPrompt: You are a helpful assistant that creates concise summaries.
parameters.userPrompt: Summarize this article in 2-3 sentences: Title: ${steps.fetch_article.data.title}. Body: ${steps.fetch_article.data.body}

metadata.author: glue-team
metadata.notes: This workflow demonstrates the OpenAI connector by fetching content and generating an AI summary. Requires OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable. Uses gpt-4o-mini for cost efficiency.
